nodes.bodyText: Can you explain a bit why make PreviewRequest non-parameterized will help the preview perf?

commit.message:
(CDAP-16308) Make preview start more responsive

- Reduced the synchronized block scope on preview start
  so that it only blocks on injector creation.
- Refactoring
-- Remove usage on the ProgramStore
-- Make PreviewRequest to be non-parameterized

afterCommit.message:
